We also cover topics such as Islamic and national history, geographical and cultural issues. And furthermore our short-specialized courses are also held to boost your knowledge in a particular subject. We responsibly present Islamic and modern education through our uniqueÂ platform.

aboutPage.title1Details: We welcome all students who are interested in learning the Quran.  Al Noor Safa Online Academy is the leading independent online Islamic academy for those who want to learn online through virtual classrooms. We have created a comprehensive curriculum for Quran and basic Islamic education and we specialize in providing different subjects according to the needs of students from 1st to 6th grade. Our curriculum includes learning Islam, (Noorani Qaida, Quran, Tajweed, Faith, Fiqh) as well as more languages. Like Pashto, Dari, English, Arabic. We also pay attention to subjects like Islamic and national history, geography and culture so that students have the spirit of love for the country along with Islamic education. And likewise our short specialized courses expand your knowledge in a particular subject. We believe in the importance of personalized learning; Because it strengthens the students in a particular subject and quickly leads them to their goal.
aboutPage.title2_2Details: We have prepared a comprehensive curriculum on Islamic sciences, Noorani Qaida, Quran, Tajweed, Aqeedah and Fiqh.
aboutPage.title2_4Details: Our academy offers courses in Pashto, Dari, English and Arabic languages. By offering a variety of languages, we enable our students to improve their language skills
aboutPage.title2_6Details: In addition to Islamic studies and language courses, we also focus on subjects such as history, geography and culture. So that students get a broader perspective.
aboutPage.title2_8Details: Our excellent and experienced teachers use effective teaching strategies and innovative methods to create an interactive and stimulating learning environment
aboutPage.title3_1Details: Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using Alnoor Safa Academy's online educational services!
aboutPage.title3_3Details: To enroll in Alnoor Safa Academy courses, simply visit our website and navigate to the enrollment page. Follow the instructions provided, fill in the required information, and complete the registration process. After registration, we will give you a unique username and password where your complete information will be available. Such as: course, course duration, instructor, and fee payment.
aboutPage.title3_5Details: All course materials, content and resources provided by Al Noor Safa Academy are copyright protected. Students may not reproduce, distribute or modify any course material without permission from Al Noor Safa Academy. Rather, they may use the course materials for personal educational purposes only.
aboutPage.title3_7Details: Students are expected to respect the academic rules and protect themselves from any harassment, discrimination and confusion and should not share their account information with unauthorized persons.
aboutPage.title3_8Details: If you do not agree with any part of these terms, please refrain from using our services!
aboutPage.title4: Al Noor Safa Academy Privacy Policy
aboutPage.title4_1Details: Protecting your privacy is important to us at Al Noor Safa Academy.
aboutPage.title4_3Details: We collect your personal information, such as your name, contact and payment information, when you enroll in our courses or interact with our website. This information is necessary to provide our services, access the course, and communicate with you.
aboutPage.title4_5Details: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials. Please do not share your login information with others, and notify us immediately if you suspect unauthorized access or use of your account.
aboutPage.title4_7Details: Our Services are intended for users of all ages. For children under 10 years of age, we require parental consent to register and collect personal information. We do not collect personal information from children without parental consent
aboutPage.title4_8Details: Remember, learning is a journey and Alnoor Safa Online Academy supports and guides you every step of the way.
aboutPage.title8: How Does Alnoor Safa Academy Work?
aboutPage.title9Details: First of all you have to register in order to enroll in a course
aboutPage.title10Details: After successfull registring enroll in any course you wish to learn
aboutPage.title11Details: start your course any time in the day you like
aboutPage.missionTitle: Education In Continuing A Proud Tradition
aboutPage.missionDetails: We are trying to teach you and your children Quran. In order to understand the message of Allah Almighty, and in the same way, we call it our responsibility that students are rich in compassion, gratitude, social responsibility and Islamic principles and morals. We give priority to the spiritual growth of students and instruct them to Live according to your national and Islamic beliefs. We have prepared a comprehensive educational curriculum for students of all ages. And we have appointed teachers of their choice to teach them so that they feel comfortable and learn easily.
aboutPage.visionTitle: Education Is About Creating Leaders For Tomorrow
aboutPage.visionDetails: We are committed to excellence in education. We are constantly evaluating and updating our curriculum; To align with the latest educational standards and best learning. We promise that we will give personal attention to each student, we will pay attention to their needs and special strengths. At Al Noor Safa Academy, we are committed to achieving our mission, upholding our values, and delivering on our commitment to providing an exceptional online education. Join us on this journey and experience the learning difference!
